question:
Which of the following is/ are harvest festival(s)?Â 
  1. Onam
  2. Bhogali Bihu
  3. Pongal
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Festivals which are celebrated to mark the harvesting of crops in India include Basant Panchami, Pongal, Makar Sankranti, Lohri, Onam, Baisakhi, Bhogali Bihu, etc.
